name: Advanced Training
description: Choose a Skill that meets this Talent’s requirement. When performing a duel using the chosen Skill, the character increases her final duel total by +1. A character can take this Talent multiple times, but each time a different Skill must be chosen.

name: Armor Training
description: This character reduces the penalty to Defense from wearing armor by 1, to a minimum of 0. A character can take this Talent multiple times.

name: Back to the Wall
description: When this character is within 1 yard of a wall or other solid object at least as tall as she is, she gains +1 Defense.

name: Better Part of Valor
description: This character’s Charge Aspect becomes “—” (rendering her unable to take the Charge Action), but she gains a +2 to her Walk Aspect.

name: Blissful Ignorance
description: When this character fails a Horror Duel, if it is her turn, her current Action immediately fails, but she does not become **Paralyzed.** If it is not her turn, she becomes **Slow** instead of **Paralyzed.**

name: Call Shot
description: Choose a Skill. When this character generates a Critical Effect with an attack that used the chosen Skill, she may discard a card to change the suit of the Critical Effect to the suit of the discarded card. A character may take this Talent multiple times, but each time a different Skill must be chosen.

name: Calm And Collected
description: This character adds +1 to the value of any **Focused** condition that she receives, to a maximum of **Focused +3**.

name: Clear Orders
description: When this character takes the Order Action to give commands to one or more subordinate characters, she may Cheat Fate for those characters.

name: Combat Reading
description: When making disengaging strikes, this character adds her Scrutiny Skill Ranks to her final duel total.

name: Counterspell
description: Training in the art of Counter-Spelling has given this character an intuitive ability to resist magic. When this character is targeted by an enemy’s Magical Action, the enemy loses any suits associated with their Magical Skill.

name: Critical Strike
displayedReqs: Requirement: Close Combat or Ranged Combat Skill 3 or higher.
description:
Choose a Skill that meets this Talent’s requirement. All attacks with the chosen Skill gain the following Trigger:

[r] *Critical Strike*: When damaging, deal 1 additional damage for each [r] in the final duel total.

A character may take this Talent multiple times, but each time a different Skill must be chosen.

name: Defensive Protocols
description: This character’s subordinate characters that are within [a] 6 of her may choose to flip cards when they are attacked, in the same manner as a Fated character.

name: Duck and Cover
description: This character gains the following ability: **Blast Resistant +1**: Reduce all damage this character suffers from [p] and [b] effects by +1, to a minimum of 1.

name: Flick of the Wrist
description: When making a Melee or Pugilism attack, this character may substitute Grace for Might when calculating her Acting value.

name: Governor's Gift
description: Choose male or female. This character gains [+] on any Bewitch or Scrutiny duels made against members of the chosen gender.

name: Cynic
description: This character gains [+] on any duel made to resist deception (including Deceive and Pick Pocket Challenges, as well as the Trick Action).

name: Great Fate
description: When this character draws her Control Hand at the end of the Prologue, she draws one additional card. A character may take this Talent multiple times, and its effects stack.

name: Gruesome Attack
displayedReqs: Requirement: Close Combat or Ranged Combat Skill 3 or higher.
description: Choose a Skill that meets this Talent's requirements. All Critical Effect flips this character generates from attacks using the chosen Skill receive [+]. A character may take this Talent multiple times, but each time a different Skill must be chosen.

name: Gruff
description: This character gains a [+] to Deceive and Intimidate Challenges.

name: Hobbling Attack
displayedReqs: Requirement: Close Combat or Ranged Combat Skill 3 or higher.
description:
Choose a Skill that meets this Talent’s requirement. All attacks with the chosen Skill gain the following Trigger:

[r] *Hobble*: After succeeding, the target gains the following Condition for the remainder of Dramatic Time: “**Hobbled**: This character may only declare one Movement General Action per turn and may not declare the Run Action.”

A character may take this Talent multiple times, but each time a different Skill must be chosen.

name: Honest
description: This character doesn’t have to try to convince others to trust her; they can see that she has an honest nature. This character gains [+] to all Convince and Leadership Duels.

name: Imposing Mass
description: This character may not be very graceful, but she’s become quite good at using her physical size to her advantage in combat. This character gains [+] to her disengaging strikes and to any Impose Action she takes.

name: Let Me Show You
description: This character has a natural affinity for teaching other people how to do things. She may spend 15 minutes and discard a Twist Card to explain how one of her General Talents works to another character. That character may then discard a Twist Card to gain the taught General Talent for the rest of the day. The taught character must still meet all the necessary physical prerequisites for the Talent. Talents with a requirement of Invested, Stitched, or Twisted cannot be taught.

name: Open Hand Fighting
description: If the character is wielding a Melee weapon and has nothing in her other hand when she makes a successful disengaging strike, she may choose to have her disengaging strike deal damage to her target.

name: Paired Weapons
displayedReqs: Requirement: Close Combat or Ranged Combat Skill 3 or higher.
description: Choose a Skill that meets this Talent’s requirement. When this character is wielding two weapons of the chosen type, one in each hand, she gains [+] to any attacks made with either weapon. The second weapon merely gives her a bonus to hit. If wielding two Ranged Combat weapons, this Talent expends one round of ammunition from each weapon.

name: Plain-Spoken
description: This character doesn’t try to muddy her conversation with flowery language and is good at saying difficult truths efficiently. This character gains [+] to Social Duels made during Dramatic Time.

name: Polyglot
description: When this character gains this Talent, she chooses two languages that she does not already speak and learns how to speak them. When conversing with another character in their native, non-English language, this character gains [+] to her Barter and Bewitch duels.

name: Quick Study
description: During the Epilogue, when presented with Skill Advancement options by the Fatemaster, this character may instead advance in any Skill she does not already possess instead of the Skill Advancement options presented by the Fatemaster. She must have witnessed a friendly character succeed at the chosen Skill at some point during the session.

name: Rush
description: The character increases her Charge Aspect by +1. A character may take this Talent multiple times, and its effects stack.

name: Secretive Spellcasting
description: When this character casts a Spell or Manifested power, she may discard a card to make her Magical Theory appear to be the Thalarian Doctrine to anyone who attempts to detect it.

name: Seize the Day
description: This character gains [+] to her Initiative flips.

name: Shot Studies
description: If this character has the **Focused** Condition and is firing a shotgun loaded with slug ammunition, she multiplies the range of the shotgun by x10.

name: Shove Aside
description: This character can move through characters with a Height lower than her own without being impeded. Such characters cannot make disengaging strikes against this character.

name: Shrug Off
description:
This character gains the following Tactical Action:

(0) Shrug Off: This character may discard a Twist card to end a Condition affecting her.

name: Specialized Skill
displayedReqs: Requirement: Fatemaster Character or 2 or more completed Destiny Steps.
description:
Choose a Skill and a suit. Add the chosen suit to the chosen Skill’s value.

A character may take this Talent multiple times, but each time, a different Skill must be chosen.

name: Specialized Toxins
description:
The character chooses one of the following Characteristics: Living, Construct, Undead, Spirit, or Nightmare. When this character performs an Action or declares a Trigger that gives a target with the chosen Characteristic the **Poison** Condition, the target gains an additional **Poison** +1.

A character may take this Talent multiple times, but each time a different Characteristic must be chosen.

name: Speed Loading
displayedReqs: Requirement: Chosen Skill Rank 2 or higher.
description:
Choose the Long Arms, Pistols, Shotguns, or Heavy Weapons Skill. The character gains the following Trigger on any attack Action using the chosen Skill:

[r] Speed Loading: If this weapon’s Reload AP cost is 2 or lower, reload this weapon.

name: Steam-Powered Charge
displayedReqs: Requirement: Character must be a Construct or possess one or more pneumatic limbs.
description: When this character declares the Charge Action, she may choose to make a single (1) AP or (2) AP Close Combat attack instead of two (1) AP Close Combat attacks. If she chooses to makes a single (1) AP Close Combat attack, it deals +1 damage and knocks the target **Prone** if successful.

name: Sturdy
description:
This character gains +2 Wounds.

This Talent may be taken multiple times; each additional time this Talent is taken, this character gains +1 Wound.

name: Sure-Footed
description: When this character is pushed or moved by an effect, she may apply her Speed Aspect as a penalty to the distance (in yards) that she is pushed or moved by the effect.

name: Tenacious Warrior
description: When an enemy makes a successful attack against this character and declares a Trigger, this character may discard a card. If she does so, the Trigger has no effect on her (though it may still affect others and the attack deals normal damage).

name: Threatening Posture
description: Enemies engaged with this character suffer a – penalty on Close Combat attacks made against targets other than her who do not also possess this Talent.

name: Tricky Shot
displayedReqs: Requirement: Chosen Skill Rank 2 or higher.
description: Choose a Ranged Combat Skill. While making an attack with the chosen Skill, this character may choose to ignore one –.

name: Twisted Fates
description: When this Talent is chosen, choose a card in the character’s Twist deck and permanently increase its value by 1, to a maximum value of 13. A character may take this Talent multiple times.

name: Unassuming
description: This character gains + to any duels made to avoid being noticed in a group or angering someone.

name: Undermine Confidence
description: This character gains + to all Intimidate Challenges made during Narrative Time.

name: Unequaled Accuracy
displayedReqs: Requirement: Magical or Ranged Combat Skill 2 or higher.
description: Choose a Skill that meets this Talent’s requirement. This character does not randomize her target when firing into an engagement using the chosen Skill.

name: Wall of Muscle
description: Increase this character’s Height to 3. In addition, increase the range of all [y] weapons wielded by this character by 1 yard, to a maximum of 3 yards.

name: Will of Ages
description: When this character uses Magical Shielding, she may shield a number of additional friendly characters (including herself) equal to her Tenacity.

name: Advanced Sensors
description: This character gains a [+] on Notice duels and is capable of detecting things that other characters might miss, such as the presence of invisible creatures (though not their exact position) with a Difficult Notice Challenge.

name: Avoidant
description: The character’s heightened sense of pain has encouraged her to become really, really good at avoiding it. This character permanently loses 1 Wound but gains +1 Defense.

name: Blot the Sky
description: When the character makes an Archery attack, her Moderate damage gains +[b], and her Severe damage gains +[b][b] (provided that she expends two additional arrows per resulting +[b]).

name: Book Smart
description: While this character has learned quite a bit from her books, all that reading has dulled her reaction time. This character gains a [-] to Initiative but a [+] to all non-Magical Intellect Challenges.

name: C-C-C-Combo!!!!
description:
The character gains the following Trigger on her Martial Arts Close Combat attacks:

*[m] Combo!*: This character may take this attack again against the same target. This second attack may not declare Triggers.

name: Channel Destiny
description: When this character performs a duel, she may suffer 2 damage before flipping any cards to add a suit of her choice to her final duel total. If this damage causes the character to suffer a Critical Effect or Toughness check to remain conscious, resolve the initial duel before checking for either.

name: Cheating So and So
description:
It’s one thing to play the odds, but it’s something else entirely to stack the game in your favor. The character gains the following Trigger on all Expertise Challenges:

*[m] Stack the Deck*: After resolving, you may look at the top card of the Fate deck and then choose whether or not to put it on the bottom of the deck.

name: Common Sense
description: This character has a good head on her shoulders and can generally make sense of most things. She may discard a Twist Card during Narrative Time to gain a [+] on a duel.

name: Concussive Force
description: Any time the character deals damage with the Martial Arts or Pugilism Skills, she may push her target directly away from her a number of yards equal to her Might Aspect.

name: Demanding Taskmaster
description:
The character gains the following Trigger on her Flexible Close Combat attacks:

*[m] Motivation*: After succeeding, move the target 1 yard if this attack dealt Weak damage, 2 yards if Moderate, and 3 yards if Severe.
